name: Jamie Contreras
text: Medical mall very very nice place

name: Alexander Aksakov
text:
Simple drug screening. Been sitting here for 2 hours. The only thing they did fast was taking my money.
UPD: 3 hours as of now.

name: SONYA FEAGIN
text: They are able to get you in and out efficiently. Yes, there is wait depending how many are ahead of you.

name: Owen Rumbley
text: Pack a lunch. You will be here all day. This place is outdated and almost scary. If you get the option, go to the Daphne location. I will not be back.

name: Scott Duplantis
text: I had an employee fall sick while working offshore. Needed them to see him late in the day (4:30-5:00pm). They would not stay to help him out... Told me everything I needed to know about the level of dedication/work ethic this office has. Do not expect them to go above and beyond for you. Horrible.

name: MarshClips
text: My family of 4 went to this location to have vaccines for our trip to Africa.  The staff was so helpful, professional and caring!!  The nurse that gave us our shots was the BEST!  She definitely knew what she was doing.  We went at 7:30 am and, after filling out the paperwork, the wait time was very short!  Need vaccinations?  Go here!! You will be super pleased!

name: Alexandria Reed
text: I visited this location twice. I had to get a DOT physical and drug test for employment. The staff was very nice and answered all my questions. The wait time for my first visit was less than an hour. The second visit was a little over an hour due to the amount of people who also came for testing.

name: Lance Havard
text: Expect to spend your entire day here. Taking 4 hours to get a drug test and physical. Still waiting to see the doctor for the physical.

name: Z Bell
text: Arrived at 11:55am and finally finish at 1:58pm! OMG!!!!! That's a long wait for a physical and drug test! Be prepared

name: Jared Harris
text: Wasn't happy with the service.  I felt I was skipped by a few people as I waited for over an hour just to get tested for a respirator.  Then had to wait again for over 20 mins for a doctor.  The visit before this one was good.  No issues.  But today wasn't even that busy. Total time 2 hrs 30 mins.

name: Freddie Crayton
text: Slowest place ever been here over an hour for a drug screening. Still waiting

name: Markell Carter
text: Terrible! I've been waiting 3 hours to see a doctor for a basic physical! Two hours in a patient room, come to find out the medical staff went to lunch  without notifying us and there's two of use waiting to see the same doctor. This is sad! They put you in a room and say the doctor will be right in smh this is just sad employers don't send your employees here for medical exams

name: q
text: This place is super slow. I wouldn't recommend coming here. I was skipped over by a few people. I only needed a physical.

name: Tiffiney Cooper
text: I have been waiting in the waiting office for over an hour... for a drug test.... crazy!

name: ladytay88
text: Dr Hamilton's a complete ass#@!£

name: Reagan Andrews
text: 2 hours to take a drug test!!!!

name: Eric Steele
text: Great job guys

name: Boyd Kendall
text: Extremely slow

name: Johanny0122@gmail.com Santiago
text:
(Translated by Google) The worst hospital I have ever visited, I got there with excruciating pain in my back that I couldn't even sit, and what they did was ask me protocol questions, they never checked me, they left me in a wheelchair outside and they only gave me two injections in the waiting room, then they sent me home without checking and no matter the pain I felt, horrible place, I don't recommend it.

(Original)
El peor hospital que he visitado, llegue allí con dolor insoportable en la espalda que no podía estar ni sentada, y lo que hicieron fue hacerme preguntas de protocolo, nunca me revisaron, me dejaron en una silla de ruedas afuera y solo me pusieron dos inyecciones en la sala de espera, luego me enviaron a casa sin revisarme y sin importar el dolor que sentía, horrible lugar, no lo recomiendo.

name: Jayson Duncan
text: I couldn't ask for a better group of individuals, from the receptionist to the Dr. They were exceptionally nice and polite. Given the fact that I happen to appear as if I had just been released from prison they still respectfully listened and helped me. The Dr, (Bonuel) was outstanding and honestly was concerned about my well-being. I was blessed to have located this office.

resp.text: Dear Jayson, Thank you for the awesome feedback. It's great to know that we were able to provide you with the highest levels of service. We look forward to serving you many more times in the future! Hope you visit us again soon!

name: Chris Kendrick
text:
Do NOT go here. A routine visit for birth control ended in tears. The doctor had no bedside manor, and stated that she was "pushing the limits of what I can do" in doing so. Her words, not mine. She then proceeded to berate my wife on all the other various things that could be done. We paid the full $175 ( for those uninsured), to be seen with the same level of care and compassion anyone would want to experience from a medical professional. Instead, now I have a wife in tears. Instead of giving any confidence in where things are at, they filled her with anxiety, took our money, and shoved her out the door.

They use different rotating doctors between their locations, and I personally have had good doctors at this location before. They all left. Not just due to other factors, but because how they themselves, as doctors, are treated. Educate yourself, and read other experiences to make your own conclusion, but neither I nor anyone in my family will ever set foot in this building or any other AFC location again.

name: 7childwillie
text: My son went there this morning with sore throat, body aches. No covid test, no strep throat test, nothing! Told him to come home and take Niquil!

name: Jase Buttram
text:
My sister went in there after the staff TOLD her to come to the office to pick up a form. The girl at the front desk was rude and embarrassed my sister, not to mention the potential HIPAA violation by disclosing her medical condition to anyone sitting in the lobby. I can’t believe this is how you treat your patients. This place is a joke. DO NOT GO HERE!

**UPDATE** Not at all satisfied by this canned response. I would imagine you would want to seek resolution.

resp.text: We regret to hear that your recent experience was anything less than exceptional. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will use your comments to refine our efforts to ensure this issue does not happen again.

name: Rebecca Smith
text: 10/10 would recommend

name: Stacy King
text: This is the worst place to visit as far as doctors offices go. They do the bare minimum and honestly could care less if anything happens to you. Worst experience ever and would never go here again. They’ll gladly take your money that’s for sure.

resp.text: We regret to hear that your recent experience was anything less than exceptional.Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will use your comments to refine our efforts to ensure this issue does not happen again.

name: Melissa Deleo
text: I love this place! The Staff and Doctor are both wonderful. However, I cannot seem to get them on the phone. I had some questions about my medication and possible refill. The lines just ring and ring. Other than that, this place is wonderful.

name: Allen Stinson
text: This has got to be my worst experience ever. I went in to get tested placed my name on the list at 0807. Yes it was a full sheet then she said it wold be a 4 hour wait. I was at the counter and the check in receptionist was unprofessional. In the middle of my check in she started talking to another employee totally disregarding that I was there. I left and waited on my call back. After waiting 6 hours I still didn’t receive a call back I drove to the clinic. She started I was next to get called but there was 5 people ahead of me. Finally got called in at 3 pm and sat in a room for an hour. Mind you I’m still waiting for someone to come in. As I’m looking around the floor is nasty, hair everywhere and some even waxed into the floor. This place is definitely unprofessional and I will NOT ADVISE ANYONE TO COME!!!

name: beth elilio
text: Nice staff but the wait was SO RIDICULOUSLY LONG! Me and my 86 years old injured mom with a Dementia had to wait two and half hours just to get her covid-19 test done.

name: Dobasai
text: Unfortunately my insurance only covers me to go here to visit Dr howton in my area. They made me fill out my physical forms, took my $50 dollars and then I waited for 15 minutes. Dr howton then appeared in the doorway, looked at me, and told me I need to go to the emergency room (in the middle of a pandemic.) Obviously if I was in an emergency situation I would've gone to the emergency room. Doctor is very lazy and doesn't truly care about her patient's well being. Not sure how you can diagnose someone or refer them somewhere without coming within 15 feet of them. What a joke of a doctor she gives this whole place a bad name. Wouldn't come back here if I were on my death bead. Because they would probably just charge me $100 and refer me to a funeral home.

name: Armekia Houston
text: Miss Kelli the care manager was very polite and helpful when it came to taking care of my sick child needs. Overall each staff member I came in contact with was friendly, knowledgeable and well capable of performing their job duties in a timely manner.

resp.text: It's experiences like yours that really keep us motivated! Our teams strive to deliver an excellent experience, and are glad you found this to be the case during your visit. If you have further needs or questions, please reach out! Thank you so much for the positive review!

name: Beth Chapman
text: Nurse who gave me my DPT, was awesome!! Very skilled at what she's doing!! Didn't hurt when she stuck me and no pain today! Everyone extremely nice and caring! Thank you all!! My finger is getting better!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback! We're glad to hear we delivered such a great experience. If there's anything further we can do for you, we are happy to help!

name: Letoya Smith
text: Great staff!!! I was very impressed with how quickly I was registered, and then called straight to the back. The doctor I saw (I apologize for not remembering her name) was very detailed in discussing my issue with me and I really appreciated that. Great service!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review! If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: Shawn Castaneda
text:
I took my son here yesterday, to verify a fracture. The staff and the doctor were fantastic. Quick, professional and good sense of humor.  Dr Houghton was a peach! Makes me think she raised a boy or two as well.
Having boys, I'm sure I will be back for more casts, stitches or something.
Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review! Our teams strive to deliver an excellent experience, and are glad you found this to be the case during your visit. If you have further needs or questions, please reach out. We can't wait to see you again, have a great day!

name: Donna Kirkendoll
text: The office was extremely clean. The staff was friendly and efficient. Dr. Handley was attentive and listened to me describe my symptoms before beginning his examination for diagnosis. I will definitely return here when needed. Excellent!!!

resp.text: We're glad to hear we delivered such a great experience. If there's anything further we can do for you, we are happy to help!

name: Taneika Gaines
text: The young lady at the front was so sweet welcoming..LaShonda in the screening area was  great to the nurse and doctor everyone just went over and beyond..

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback! We're glad to hear we delivered such a great experience. If there's anything further we can do for you, we are happy to help!

name: Kathryn Carter
text: I waited for over three hours to learn that I was negative for strep, flu, and mono. The doctor didn’t give me ANY suggestions of treatment or over the counter medicines. With the diagnosis of “viral syndrome” I feel like I wasted my time and money at this location. I still feel TERRIBLE and was given ZERO suggestions or help by the doctor!!!!!!!

resp.text: It's upsetting to hear that your experience was anything but stellar. We would like to work towards a resolution, so if you are willing, please reach out to us at (205) 722-9500 to discuss this further.

name: Kevin's Adventures
text: Been here for 3 hours in a full lobby of sick people and they have only taken 2 patients back since opening.  They are not even checking anyone in to treat them. Worse office I have ever seen.  Only excuse from front desk is they are busy but hard to be busy when you wont check anyone in.

name: Gina Grantham
text: From the front desk staff to all the nurses, my experience was excellent. Dr Akhtar was my doctor in Birmingham and I followed him!  AFC is a TEN and I will go again!  Thank you kindly!

resp.text: We're glad to hear we delivered such a great experience. If there's anything further we can do for you, we are happy to help!

name: Michelle Alazzam
text: The second doctor I seen was incredible! She sat down and LISTENED to me. Most doctors seem to come in and be "in a hurry" or like their trying to rush you, but she didn't. Which made me feel at ease and could remember all the questions I was wanting to ask and more. I had no anxiety talking to her and she answered all my questions with detail.

resp.text: Thank you again for taking the time to let us know how we did. We hope you have a great day! Thanks again for taking the time to leave us this information about your recent visit. Take care!

name: Annie Byrd
text: Very professional and friendly.  Service was greeted with a smile.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback! We hope you have a great day!

name: Hannah Hulsey
text: Everyone from the moment we walked in the door was rude. There were only a handful of people in the lobby and it took 3 hours for us to even get back into a room, then another hour and half wait in the room. Your much better off going to med center, even if it is packed it will still be quicker than here.

resp.text: Hannah Kay, we regret to hear that you had a negative experience with us, but would appreciate the chance to turn your experience around. Our manager would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at (205) 722-9500. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Heather Younkins
text: Excellent staff and care! Not a long wait at all.  Everyone was friendly and super helpful.  Place was clean and inviting.  I would definitely recommend this place and will be back if ever a need.  Thank you,  American Family Care for taking great care of my husband and me.

resp.text: Heather Eppley, we're so glad that we were able to go above and beyond your expectations!

name: Snow Man
text: The staff was amazing. I was on a very tight schedule and I asked the receptionist before signing in if they could work with that amount of time and to my amazement they were able to complete the entire visit within my time constraints. That effort alone convinced me to change my primary care to AFC.

resp.text: Snow, reviews like this give us motivation and help us ensure we provide high-quality care. Thank you again for letting our team know how we did! We look forward to helping again in the future. Take care!

name: Pam Harless
text: The staff is extremely nice, helpful, and caring! Dr.Howton was exceptional as well. She went above and beyond to satisfy the patient/patients family. Then to add icing on the cake, the office called today to follow up and check on my baby! Never before have I ever had a doctor's office do that! Great crew!!!

resp.text: Hi Pamela, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at American Family Care - Tuscaloosa. We're happy we could meet your expectations! Our team strives to deliver an excellent experience, and are glad you found this to be the case during your visit. If you have further needs or questions, please reach out!

name: Sherricka Gordon
text: The staff was friendly. The dr was also friendly and checked me thoroughly. My wait time was also excellent

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback! We're glad to hear we delivered such a great experience. If there's anything further we can do for you, we are happy to help!

name: Jamie Eubanks
text: From the moment you walk in you are greeted with a friendly smile! Dr.Klaiss is AMAZING not only is she very knowledgeable but truly cares for her patients!! I wish she had her own office, I would recommend her for any and all of your needs. I can't even say enough good things about the nurses,  my favorite gives shots like no other!! They have helped me so much!! They are the BEST and also very caring! They even call and make sure you are doing better!!

resp.text: Jamie Eubanks, we're so glad that we were able to go above and beyond your expectations!

name: Nikita Ward
text: The staff was extremely nice and friendly, so was the provider. The service was quick I was out in about 30 minutes.

resp.text: We're glad to hear we delivered such a great experience. If there's anything further we can do for you, we are happy to help!

name: Lori Angeloff
text: Absolutely rude horrible staff, not wanting to do their job and trying to turn my sick children away. Wyneshia and the MA with no name tag didn't know or do their job and had attitude. Will be calling corporate first thing in the morning. But I will say I did like Dr Howton once we saw her she was great with my kids, treated us so nice and got us out in a reasonable time. So this Star is only for Dr Howton. My problem that we encounter with AFC is way to long to go into detail on here.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback about your experience with us.We would like to have a better understanding about your experience. Please reach out to us at (205) 722-9500 at your earliest convenience and we will do our best to resolve this with you.

name: Heather Alford
text: Wait time hasn't been long. The care we received was thorough. The staff is all very nice.

name: Lewis Jones
text: Staff were on point awesome job.

resp.text: We're glad to hear we delivered such a great experience. Its experiences like yours that really keep us motivated! If there's anything further we can do for you, we are happy to help.

text: I went in today, they were all very gentle and thorough. My doctor (some nice and funny lady) listened to all of my concerns and didn’t take how I was feeling lightly. Very thorough to get to the root of the problem and to make you feel better. The nurses and staff were friendly. Will return to here when I need to. :)

resp.text: Hi Madison, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at American Family Care - Tuscaloosa. We're happy we could meet your expectations! Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything additional we can do for you.

text: American Family Care they did they awesome job friendly courteous and informative the doctor address my needs and my concerns the entire staff was great

name: Mohogany S. Prewitt
text: I had an excellent Doctor's visit! I usually see Dr. Klaiss, she is very knowledgeable, listens to you,  and is pleasant. She was not there on the day that I visited, so I saw Dr. Sexton. She was great and she is also a great listener.  She took care of me right away.  I have been to another Urgent care facility in Tuscaloosa and the level of care did not measure up. It was not terrible, just not as good as the facility at 69 south.

resp.text: Thank you very much for sharing these comments, Mohogany S. Prewitt. We always love to receive great feedback.

name: Lisa Myrick
text: I loved that my Dr. Nadeem Akhtar wanted to get to the root of the problem instead of just giving me a shot and sending me on my way. He was extremely thorough and took a lot of time going over different techniques to help my issue. I really appreciated the time he spent with me. I'm looking for a new internist in town and he has my vote!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review! If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: Ann Horst
text: Amazing experience! From the front desk staff, nurse taking vitals, X-ray tech to the doctor, all were pleasant and thorough. In and out in about an hour!! Will definitely visit again should the need arise!

resp.text: Ann, we are so pleased you enjoyed your visit to American Family Care - Tuscaloosa! Thank you again for the great review!

name: Be Kind
text: very clean, the staff was very professional.  I love this place

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback! We hope you have a great day!

name: Jessica Dieken
text: I highly recommend this clinic. I have gone to other clinics closer to home and was treated terribly. It is refreshing to have been treated well both times I went here. It is worth the extra 15 minute drive. Dr. Klaiss saw me both times and had good bedside manner and was helpful with what I needed.

name: Linda Wedgeworth
text: They were very good. Their receptionist was very nice and helpful to me. Thank you for her.

name: Craig Pepple
text: Good job! The steroid shot worked wonders.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback! We're glad to hear we delivered such a great experience. If there's anything further we can do for you, we are happy to help!

name: Lauren Dennis
text: I went in to the clinic 5 minutes before they closed. I honestly didn't think they would take me, but they did. There was no wait to get seen. All of the staff were very nice. I told them my symptoms and everything but I passed out when they tried to take my blood. They were all really helpful and gave me something to eat and drink. They told me to come back tomorrow if I was still feeling bad because they didn't want to continue to prod at me when I was faint. A nurse walked me outside. They called my mom the next morning to see if I was okay. Very kind and professional.

resp.text: Thank you very much for sharing these comments, Lauren Dennis. We always love to receive great feedback.

name: Samiullah Henderson
text: Loved it. Everyone was so nice. The doctor Wada true professional. He answered all my questions. I was quite satisfied

resp.text: Samiullah, we are so pleased you enjoyed your visit to American Family Care - Tuscaloosa! If you have any further questions, please give us a call. We're always happy to help!

text: Dr. Howton and staff are rude crude and sociall2 unacceptable i wouldnt take my dog there the need to be reviewed by cooperate and shu the f down

Dr. Nadeem Akhtar,

Stanley Summerford

name: Lee Barber
text: Very little wait time with great treatment service. Staff and doctor were excellent.

resp.text: Lee Barber, thank you so much for the positive review!

name: Alice Dombrowski
text: Rate my experience as a 5  star begin with the staff and the Doctor. Great to know I'm in great hands at American Family Care

name: Cynthia Dancy
text: My Provider and the staff were attentive, professional and friendly! It's the reason why I choose AFC for my healthcare!

name: April Rico
text: If I could give them a zero I would. I went in there on a Sat at 5 with a bad earache and mouth was broke out from another medication. Dr come in looked in ear said it's nothing and looked in my mouth said I don't see nothing. I knew he was lying bc I was in pain and I feel stuff draining out of my ear and my mouth had irritation on it. He was so rude. I had to leave there and go to another clinic and it's a funny thing another Dr sees fluid on my ear and irritation on my tongue and mouth. I was given antibiotic and something for my mouth. Never again will I go to this place and I recommend no-one else goes. I wish I didn't have to pay him anything bc it's not fair that I had to leave this Dr and go to another one. 😡

resp.text: Hi April Rico, we regret to hear that your recent experience was anything less than exceptional. We would like the opportunity to address your concerns. Please reach out to us directly at (205) 722-9500 when you have a chance. Thank you, and we look forward to hearing from you.

name: B McDonald
text: "Manager" does not get back with you, nor is she available when I call in the morning and evening. It is not a first time occurance. I have waited for weeks (several times) on a referral (different ones). I have to constantly call about issues and have a hard time reaching the right person and I do not get called back. Doctors are fine at the clininc but the service and admin personnel are either under-staffed or not doing their job.

name: Alexis Russell
text: Worst care ever. Not even worth going to. Have been sick as a dog for three weeks straight. Didn't have any steroid shots, wouldn't give antibiotics, sent our prescriptions down the street to a pharmacy they KNEW was closed and 10 mins after we left and realized the pharmacy was closed they refused to answer the phone and the on call physician wouldn't call us back. Not to mention the physician never introduced herself so we have no clue what her name was and she BURPED IN OUR FACE and did not even say excuse me. Sorry excuse for a doctor, obviously does not take her vow of patient care seriously.

name: Tennille Robinson
text: Friendly staff, fast service! What more can you ask for? Thanks AFC!!!

resp.text: Tennille, thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review! Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything additional we can do for you.

name: Derek Slaughter
text: I've never waited more than 20 minutes to be seen. Staff and doctors are always polite and cordial. The nearby CVS & Walgreens locations are convenient. Facilities are very nice and clean.

name: S CB
text: THE WORST DOCTORS OFFICE IN THE WORLD DO NOT EVER COME HERE HORRIBLE SERVICE RUDE AND SMART MOUTH DOCTORS AND EMPLOYEES THERE WAS A NEW DOCTOR HERE TODAY AND SHE WAS THE RUDEST DOCTOR I'VE EVERYBODY TALK WITH WILL BE REPORTING THIS FACILITY!! DCH DOES A BETTER JOB THEN THIS PLACE!!

name: Desiree' Thorpe
text: This is a great place for family care. Great service, quick service and very competent workers.

resp.text: Desiree', thank you for sharing your positive experience!

name: Dale Fleming
text: They texted me to let me know how long a wait to expect, and to let me know when I was next up. Never seen this done, but think its a great idea. :)

resp.text: Dale, we strive for 100% satisfaction, and it is great to see you had such a positive experience at American Family Care - Tuscaloosa. Thank you, and have a fantastic day!

name: Takeasha
text: The staff is amazing from the time I walked into the door until I was finished everyone was great.

name: Stephen Williams
text: Kelly was absolutely incredible as well as the rest of the staff. I have never been treated with such care and kindness!

resp.text: Stephen, we are so happy to read such a great review about American Family Care - Tuscaloosa! If you're ever in need of more help, please let us know!

name: Jennifer Brand Browning
text: You know, I've read several of the ratings on here and just to say... I work in a medical facility, and I have been here 3 times for myself and 2x for my children now today with my husband. Usually I'm in and out within an hr to and hr and a half. I've never had an issue with the physician listening to my concerns  or the staff treating me or my family in an unprofessional manner. Generally, the staff is very warm and welcoming. I would not go here for everyday care but for care management after hours I recommend this place over the Emergency room. Especially if you only have a cold or something simple. That way the ER can serve it's purpose for medical emergencies.

name: Denise Lawrence
text: Incompetence, bad attitudes. Refused to fill out paperwork for my employer causing me to get red mark. Botched narcotic prescription wrong date causing me to be put in handcuffs and driven by police car to station.  Took 2 hours in cuffs.  Almost doesn't night in jail. Stay far far away from this place.

name: Ronnie Wilburn
text: The staff was very rude and ghetto for lack of a better word. I could here the nurses making fun of me through the door of the room I was in. The doctor told me I needed to see a specialist for stitches and refused to answer any questions. Very unprofessional.

name: donielle robertson
text: After several years of a horrible experience, I decided to go back to AFC needless to say I WILL NOT ever return. I understand there is a closing time but I was there Way before closing. As soon as I was rushed for X-rays for my knee I was never given feedback and was rushed out the door with an ace bandage on basically since they only had extra large braces... Excuse me for intruding on your time and paying your wages... NEVER EVER AGAIN!!!!!

resp.text: Greetings, I am the patient advocate with American Family Care. I am truly saddened that you are dissatisfied with American Family Care, as we strive for 100% patient satisfaction. In keeping with the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act, I cannot post a response that directly addresses the concerns mentioned. I do, however, welcome the opportunity to personally address all patient concerns, and ask that the patient or authorized representative be forwarded this message as it details my contact information. I can be reached directly by telephone at (205) 403-8902 ext. 2269. The patient or authorized representative can also complete a secure patient satisfaction survey at www.americanfamilycare.com. On behalf of American Family Care, I wish you and your family good health now and in the future.

name: Toreatha Bostic
text: Best staff nice treatment and make you feel comfortable. Kelli, Ericka,Malika and Saferia. The best.

resp.text: Toreatha Bostic, we're happy to hear you had such a positive experience with our team!

name: James Luther
text: This place is awful.  Went in three days ago- told them I did not have insurance so the lady said the co-pay for me would be 155, which is higher then the majority of other clinics around town, but I decided to go ahead and see the doctor. Not sure what the doctors name is, but she was large and had curly brown hair. The lady did not care whatsoever in diagnosing me.  I had insect bites, that I was thinking are fungal infections, so I asked for a simple KOH test to make sure it isn't- she told me she doesn't have it, its at her office, so she decided to prescribe me some cream- THATS ALL. didn't ask me anything,what the symptoms were or anything. So I made her give me a steroid shot to see what exactly it is, since she didn't care.  She had no compassion or anything, and then as I walked out, I saw her on her computer playing some yahoo game. Clinic looks nice, however the doctor I had was extremely inconsiderate.  Big waste of money, I will definitely not return. if you see a big brown curly haired doctor, ask for another doctor.

name: Ellie Cochran
text: Horrible patient care and service!! None of the receptionists, nurses, or even doctors seem to care at all about their line of work. Not sure if they just have bad attitudes, or if they simply don't care about their patients. Either way, there is no excuse. I had been sick for 3 weeks and had specific symptoms that were very basic and straight forward. The receptionist and nurse were both very rude. The doctor saw me for a total of 30 seconds before sending the nurse back in to give me a steroid shot, as if that was the cure to all medical issues. Avoid at all costs.

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback, and welcome the opportunity to address all concerns. I am the patient advocate, and I can be reached at (205) 403-8902. You can also submit concerns via a secure satisfaction survey at www.americanfamilycare.com. Thank you for allowing us to learn from you. Stay well.

name: Michele Jones
text: I have been here multiple times even a month ago. I did not have my insurance card this time. So as I was pulling it up online the front desk girls put 3 people ahead of me because they said they needed my card which they already have. Perhaps this is why there is never anyone in their waiting room

resp.text: Michele Jones, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We regret that you had a negative experience, and will use this as an opportunity to improve.

name: Amy Nix
text: Five stars is for Dr. Klaiss, she is wonderful. Dr. Howton the last time I saw her was nice and considerate.

name: Shelby Davis
text: Went in today because I have a stomach virus and I never take my insurance card with me because they have it on file. I didn't have it with me so I told the lady they should have it on file and she said yes but it's a new year so I need it. (Which is untrue bc I work at a dental office and as long as they have the number they can pull it up online themselves to see what my co-pays are.) I went on my insurance website  and couldn't find the card but could find my policy and number and she said no I need you email the card to me, I said okay can you find it since you're saying it's on here and she said no I'm not allowed?!?! The office manager takes my phone to help me look and she couldn't find the link either so she writes my policy number down, verifies my insurance and collects my copay. But the front desk lady being rude and making me cry because she wasn't being helpful and I didn't feel good was uncalled for! Usually good people and good service BUT there are those rude ones you ocasially come across.

resp.text: Greetings. We appreciate your feedback. We welcome the opportunity to address all concerns. I am the patient advocate, and I can be reached at (205) 403-8902.. Thank you for allowing us to learn from you. Stay well.

name: Steve Chambers
text:
I don't write a lot of online reviews but when I was looking up the phone number for AFC I saw how poor all the other reviews were I felt compelled to share my experience.  I visited the clinic yesterday for a suspected broken collarbone.  The staff was friendly and efficient.  (And, yes, my collarbone was broken.)  I was given some prescriptions, discharge instructions and referred to my orthopedic surgeon.  Without asking, they made a copy of my x-ray to carry to my ortho.

No trip to the dr is "fun" but this one went about as well as possible.

name: Karam Maatouk
text: Best service I ever had, definitely best place to go in Tuscaloosa

resp.text: Karam Maatouk, thank you for sharing your positive experience!

name: Linda Travis
text: The provider and staff were very helpful and attentive to my needs. I also received a follow up call today.

resp.text: Linda, we are so pleased you enjoyed your visit to American Family Care - Tuscaloosa! Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything additional we can do for you.

name: Donna Davis Porter
text: Don't bother to even stop here if you are sick! My dog gets better care from her vet than what these quacks know. Total waste of time and money.

name: Kristin Kernop
text: This is by far the worst experience I have ever had at a walkin clinic. I have a history of kidney stones. I have been seen at AFC twice within the past several months with kidney stone like symptoms- pain, blood in urine, vomiting. The doctor I saw a few months back at a Birmingham location was very nice. However, I have relocated and visited the clinic in Tuscaloosa. The doctor I saw today was rude and completely neglectful. She walked in and said I have been seen at the clinic before and she couldn't help me. She asked which ER I wanted to go to and she discharged me. The entire point of me going to a walkin clinic was to avoid the hassle of the hospital. I left and went to a clinic a few miles down the road. This doctor took a simple X-ray of my abdomen and spotted the stone in my ureter that is causing me so much pain and discomfort. The doctor at AFC should have and could have done the exact same thing and she would have seen the stone. She could have easily treated me. Instead she was rude and sent me on my way. In short, I paid for her to send me somewhere else bc she was too much of a judgmental witch. I WILL be contacting her supervisor tomorrow and they will reimburse me. I will NEVER go back to this awful place. Don't waste your time or money.

name: brandy mcelrath
text: The lady at the front desk lied and said it was their policy to check blood pressure she said they did check mine and my husband's these were two separate days the nurse checked our records and said o yours weren't wrote down and your husband's is 122/something and that's a lie his is always high they bluntly lied.  They never checked them

name: Anya Nowicki
text: Basically had me do an MRI then told me they couldn't do anything. Sent me to the emergency room but didn't even send over the x ray so payed for 2 copays and an xray for no reason.

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback, and welcome the opportunity to address all concerns. I am the patient advocate, and I can be reached at (205) 403-8902. You can also submit concerns via a secure satisfaction survey at www.americanfamilycare.com. Thank you for allowing us to learn from you. Stay well.

name: Micah McKinney
text: Trash trash trash people extremely rude. Went there one morning after cutting my arm open & the employees there did not want to help getting an attitude with me as if why are you hear making us do work. They literally did the worst job ever. They did not stitch my arm up but used medical glue then didn't even close the cut all they way. Then just put peroxide on it & sent me on my way.

resp.text: Greetings. We appreciate your feedback. We welcome the opportunity to address all concerns. I am the patient advocate, and I can be reached at (205) 403-8902.. Thank you for allowing us to learn from you. Stay well.

name: S Hall
text: Very good place to go if yourin need of a Dr

name: Mike Rodgers
text: Terrible service. I had to go a little late because I can't leave work until 5. Seemed like all the staff had an atitiude and were just ready to get out of there. The doctor barely looked me over. Made up her own diagnosis. Gave me some shots and got me out of there. my symptoms have got progressively worse. I have had the same exact expierence at one of the other clinics. It's worth it to wait and try to get appt with your primary doctor because this place is a joke.

name: Edroy Francis
text: Reading the reviews had me a little worried but everyone on staff that I met was considerate and friendly. I left without any negative to say about my visit.

name: Morgan Carter
text: Horrible place to go. Went there a couple months ago, and the lady said I had a bill, I know I don't have a bill due to my insurance covering it all. So she gave me the corporate number and I called them, I've had the same insurance for a while. I go today thinking that the corporate office took care of it like they said they did and nope, never took care of it. They refused to see me. The lady was extremely rude to me at the place and even over the phone. I will NEVER go back there. And I will not pay that "bill" they say I owe. Couldn't even give me a print out or anything about what the bill was related too.

resp.text: Greetings. We appreciate your feedback. We welcome the opportunity to address all concerns. I am the patient advocate, and I can be reached at (205) 403-8902.. Thank you for allowing us to learn from you. Stay well.

name: Irene King
text: This place lost my liscense and I talked to corporate and they won't pay to get my liscense.. they don't have a camera over front desk just when they walk out of the front office area.. I was there for a while ... when I called corporate the lady was rude and she hung up on me! They are rude and I will never go back!

resp.text: Hi Irene, we regret to hear that you are displeased with your recent experience with us. Thank you again for taking the time to let us know how we can improve. We hope you will consider us again in the future. Take care.

name: Briana Whitson
text: The door says 7days a week 8-6 here at 8:30 the doors are locked and no has been answering the phone. Good thing i dint have a medical emergency.

resp.text: Briana Whitson, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We regret that you had a negative experience, and will use this as an opportunity to improve.

name: Kenny Burns
text: I came here for a pre employment tb screening and immunizations that the employer required (healthcare setting job that I did not end up accepting).  The mmr titer screen shows if you have ever had measles mumps rubella. I was immune to all but one, no big deal. And they told me that day I could get a measles shot if I wanted one. I didn't - I'm over 50 and see no need. I am not involved in direct patient contact either, business office.  A month later I got a letter saying one of my tests was abnormal - a little scary.  I called them, they said "We don't give tests results over the phone. You have to come to the office."  I went to office and they said, "you really need to see our doctor." Scary again. I said, "I just want my results and I'll see my own doctor." And they gave the print out of the measles screen. Wow... they just wanted to talk me into an immunization and used scare tactics to do that. I was thinking diabetes, or something terrible.  They do a lot of pre employment screening and are probably using this tactic for those who don't understand what this is about. Money. Rip off place - don't go here.  This is Angeline Burns

name: Cool Dud3
text: Always friendly and quick service.

resp.text: Brantley Harris, we strive for 100% satisfaction, and it is great to see you had such a positive experience at American Family Care - Tuscaloosa. Thanks again for taking the time to leave us this information about your recent visit. Take care!

name: MultiplesOfNico
text:
I really did like this clinic. They always took good care of me.
Until I need a refill on my medicine. I called it in at CVS for a week straight. Wondering what was going on, I called them. I need my medicine ASAP. Was told they needed my doctors permission to refill it. Called AFC and was told since I wasn't seen by the regular doctor, to call that lady. Called her and was told I had to make another doctors appointment to get my refill. She was very rude. Hang up on her and got one from Dr bobo, no questions asked.

I also came to ACF for an injury I had at work. The wait was longer than usual. Yet I'm in HORRIBLE pain. It was a little over 30 minutes. Yet no one was there but me. The staff wasn't even busy. They were eating, laughing and joking around.
Finally was taken in and diagnosed correctly. My medicine was supposed to be sent to CVS. I had no script. Was also told by one of the nurses that it was sent. CVS didn't have my meds. I'm in a lot of pain. I called AFC and was basically treated like I was stupid. Repeatedly being told "Is it in the paper's we gave you?", more than four times. -____-
Surely I know what a script is. After telling them "I wasn't given one", they keep putting me on hold. For two thirty minute on call waiting, I'm VERY upset and in PAIN.  I hanged up and went to DCH.

NEVER GOING BACK.

name: Nikki Yarbrough
text: Dr. Day has horrible bedside manner and staff is very rude and inconsiderate. Never expect to be seen before at least 1.5 hours wait and there will be no one in the waiting room nor will there be any cars in the parking lot. Would not recommend this clinic to anyone.

name: June Allen
text: Very courteous staff and really quick. I was in and out in about 30 minutes.

resp.text: June Allen, we are very happy we could provide you with a positive experience!

name: Patrick Hall
text: Myself, my wife and my son, all on 3 different visits were very unhappy with diagnosis and treatment.

resp.text: Hi Patrick, we regret to hear that you are displeased with your recent experience with us. Our manager would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at (205) 722-9500. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Christopher Wigington
text: Dr. Howton is talking to someone on the phone about what Christmas presents they want while I cough up a lung in this room waiting. I will never return to this place.

resp.text: Christopher, we regret to hear that you had this experience with us. Please reach out to us at your earliest convenience so we may further assist you in working towards a resolution. American Family Care - Tuscaloosa (205) 722-9500

name: Kristy Crews
text: Convenient and very helpful with polite staff!

resp.text: Kristy Crews, thank you for the high star rating!

name: Kristi Williams
text: Terrible experience with Dr Howton and Kelly the manager. Very unprofessional .

name: andy daffron
text: Friendly great staff

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review! If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: Adam Miller
text: Friendly and fast. For a clinic, they do very well.

name: Koty Turner
text: Literally no one here. No sign on the door, no notice on the website. I called corporate for them to tell me that they're just not open today.

resp.text: Koty Turner, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We regret that you had a negative experience, and will use this as an opportunity to improve.

resp.text: Patty Moore, thank you so much for the positive review!

text: Called back and could only speak to the corporate office.  They refused to let me speak to the office where my husband was seen.  They had forgotten to give him a form back that he showed them and I requested it be mailed.   They denied our request and kept repeating that he could come pick it up if it was still there.

name: Triarii Cat
text: When I cut my finger they stitched me back up in no time

name: Shaniece Morris
text: Nasty receptionist horrible attitudes.!!!  Went for a physical for a job never want to return.!!

name: Whitney Wahl
text: Clean ans efficient.

name: John Ellis
text: After several years of subpar customer service, significant waits inside the lobby, and continual shifting in and out of physicians, they have shown some signs of improvement within the last 6 months.

name: kimberly arnold
text: So thankful and impressed with the care I received today. Dr.Thompson and his staff were so sweet, attentive and caring today.  Considering my bad circumstance, the visit could not have been any better in any way.

name: Xylair Sanchez
text: Called a week in advance to make an appointment for the covid test. I was told it is a walk in first come first serve. Was the first person in the door and the first to fill out paperwork. Had seven people get called back for the test before me. The staff said they did not know how the process works. Meanwhile members of staff not wearing maks as well people were not being told to wear masks.

name: HC Forgot
text: If it's Sunday or a Holiday and there are no other options available in Dothan, get in your car and drive as far as it takes to find another medical facility rather than going to this place. Dr. Travis Thompson is a joke. An MD who has no idea how to even ATTEMPT to communicate with a sick, anxious child that has autism. He was rude and extremely condescending. Instead of answering my son's questions he berated him. Instead of addressing concerns he belittled a sick, autistic child. Go somewhere else.

name: Dee hu
text: The people in the office were super nice and helpful. However, I was charged for the same service 3 times and after 3 days of trying no one will return my calls or emails. The one person at their cooperate office I did talk to was rude and unhelpful at all. They say they put patients first, however this clearly is just a saying

name: Alexis Brown
text: The staff is really friendly, everytime I’ve come here I have been in and out! AFC Dothan is amazing and have the best staff around!

name: Tammy Casteel
text: Was told I had to pay $20 co pay for covid test even though my insurance company(bcbs)states no co pay for covid testing. I paid receptionist $20 then she asked for my debit card to put on file. I wasn’t feeling well and wasn’t thinking at the time. I will be calling my insurance company to report this place. The NP was great, but the front desk receptionist was horrible.

name: Angie T
text: Emily Ingram, CRNP is wonderful and the best NP. She truly saved my life. Your company should be honored to have her as a NP at your facility! Thank you again for everything!

name: April Smith
text: I have been waiting for a solid week for afdc to make sure i get a medication they say that only a mail order pharmacy can fill. I called them wed and fri and today and i was told it would be fixed. Hours later nothing still has been done. I call and the medical staff does not answer the phone and if they do answer they pick it up and immediately hang it up.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review. We sincerely apologize about the issues you experienced, and we hope to make this right. Please reach out to pateitnadvocate@americanfamilycare.com so we can rectify this issue. Please include your full name, DOB, and a brief description of your experience.

name: NA
text: DON'T EVER GO HERE. They won't run your insurance correctly or even run it at all and when you try and contact them, no one answers. This place is also running a scam for covid testing. Testing is free at CVS, walgreens, and walmart go there because AFC is charging patients for it.

name: Jamie Trail
text: Any time I'm sick I go there, they are so helpful.  Yes sometimes it is slow but they can only help so many people at one time.  They are so kind and have thoroughly helped me Everytime!!!  I would absolutely recommend this place.  I've never had one person in the 5 years I've been going there ever be rude or anything but helpful and kind.  Some doctors/nurses have zero bedside manner, they hardly listen and you feel judged... It's the absolute opposite with this place, I don't have a primary care doctor simply because I love going to this place.  ❤️❤️❤️❤️ So thankful for providers that take their time and make you feel comfortable!!!

name: Jessica Umbarger
text: 30 people are ahead of me. This clinic is always slow as hell, but the ER would probably be slower. Which is where I was recommended to go when I told them I was in pain and my stuff would probably take very little time. I’m probably the only one in that waiting room in pain and to be honest I know what I probably have and just need a test and some medication. In other states you could just take this same test at home and get medicine from the local pharmacy. Really don’t even need to see the doctor. Just need medicine and to get home. I hate this place.

resp.text: We regret to hear that your recent experience was anything less than exceptional.Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will use your comments to refine our efforts to ensure this issue does not happen again.

name: Jonathan L.
text: Waited about 5 hours, upon going inside to check my wait they said something like "We wrote your number down wrong". I know this is a lie because 1. the lady who wrote it down verbally verified she wrote it down correctly 2. I could see my number on the list written correctly. Of course they refuse to correct this mistake by putting me where I should be in line or moving me up the queue. Stupidity and incompotenency rule here, will avoid in the future.

resp.text: We regret to hear that your recent experience was anything less than exceptional. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will use your comments to refine our efforts to ensure this issue does not happen again.

name: Laura Wright
text: I waited an appalling amount of time to be seen by a doctor, close to 5 hours. When they first called me back in to retrieve my Id and insurance card after an hour they told me there were 6 more people in front of me, after originally telling me there were 20 ahead of me. And then after another hours time I went in to see how much longer and they said there were 9 people ahead of me. I was extremely ill, unlike most of the people there who I presume were getting rapid covid tests, and was extremely disheartened to hear this. The girl at the front didn’t care and chalked it up to a mistake being made earlier, wasn’t apologetic or anything. I hated them in that moment. The nurses and doctor were actually very nice and got the job done, but the wait is unacceptable. I DO NOT recommend this place.

resp.text: We regret to hear that your recent experience was anything less than exceptional. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will use your comments to refine our efforts to ensure this issue does not happen again.

name: Whitney Faulk
text: Everyone on staff is always friendly and professional. The medical field is tough to work in, yet they are always friendly and show great care and concern for their patients. The office is always clean and they are following all of the COVID guidelines. Thank you, AFC!

name: Andrea Rea
text: I loved everything about A.F. urgent care!!! The best urgent care I’ve ever been to. I was very impressed with Dr. Thompson who was very caring, thorough, professional, knowledgeable, and took his time with me, conducted necessary tests and lab work, and helped me with securing the next step in getting a specialist. I would like to make Dr. Thompson my primary care physician.  He’s the kind of doctor you dream to have. Bianca and Bee, who are his nurses and tech were wonderful, friendly, and caring.  Everything is very clean and covid 19 safety measures taken.

name: Chelle Ham
text: Called to get a COVID19 test just as a precaution before visiting family for Thanksgiving and they do not test patients in their cars. This method seems much safer as that leads to less foot traffic in the office. I will not be going to AFC Dothan!

name: Carol Buie
text: Have been trying for over 3 hours to get someone on the phone and when I do I get transferred to the back where no one else answer the phone. Just trying to my prescription transferred to another pharmacy. I waited for 5 hours on Christmas Eve to been seen. They need management and phone nurse.

resp.text: We regret to hear that your recent experience was anything less than exceptional.Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will use your comments to refine our efforts to ensure this issue does not happen again.

name: Carlos Marin
text: Excellent staff and service even in Covid times, great local solution for Covid testing for international travel purposes

resp.text: If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: Pam Smith
text: My first time with this facility.. I was very impressed. At the no long wait time..the friendliness of the entire staff. They addressed my concerns and my needs very quickly,  friendly and professionally. I will go back again. Thank you!!

resp.text: If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: Jay D.
text: I will state that the people are very courteous, friendly, and inviting!!  As prompt as possible, which is a good thing during 2020!!  If the need arises, I will be sure to visit them again!  Bed side manner was very comforting, as well!!

name: HEATHER ANDRES
text: I wouldn't even give this place a 1 star, it just won't let me post ithout it. I would NEVER go here again. They gave me a prescription at a dosage for a child not an adult. I waited 5 hours just to be seen. The front desk lady was rude and acted like she hated her job and had no compassion or just thought of others. I paid them to tell them what I had. I had to tell them 3 times what I was allergic to. They don't take any kind of history. DO NOT GO HERE!

resp.text: We regret to hear that your recent experience was anything less than exceptional. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will use your comments to refine our efforts to ensure this issue does not happen again.

name: Andrea Bergman
text: The Dr. is excellent at this facility. He listens and tries to see another perspective before looking at his own. Excellent!

name: Mr. Dan Blk
text:
I had to make another visit to AFC this Saturday morning due to foot Issue. The Staff member upfront was very friendly. But the Dr. and staff in back was even better. If you have to get a shot you want Ms. McKinney she knows her business.

This is that place to go for service within and hour.

Keep you the great service.

Dan Blackman

name: Travis Eidson
text: Staff are professional and display a caring attitude. I was very impressed by the services I received.

name: Scottie Penley
text: Everyone was very nice and kept me informed of what was going on. Other than the expected wait, it was a pleasant experience.

name: Carol Deal

resp.text: If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: Bobbie Houston
text: I called 15 minutes before closing because my daughter had injured her arm.  They told me to come on and they would see her.  When we got there EVERYONE was so nice to us. We were not rushed and they didnt act like we were imposing.  We received wonderful treatment!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review! Our teams strive to deliver an excellent experience, and are glad you found this to be the case during your visit. If you have further needs or questions, please reach out. We can't wait to see you again, have a great day!

name: Max Kelley
text: As Doctor offices go, the waiting area was very clean and spacious, the receptionist was most friendly and helpful, the wait time was excellent in that there was hardly any before I was taken back to see the doctor, and I did not have to wait very long at all for that to occur. I was feeling much better very soon after getting a shot and a script for anti-biotics. I encountered a very nice experience from American Family Care!!

text: Ms. Olive was remarkable and treated me with great care. I left feeling like I was on the right track for treatment. Additionally, my nurse, Racheal, was attentive and supportive. resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review! If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: Peace Bomba
text: COMPLETE NEGLIGENCE!! I was treated very poorly at this urgent care. I went in feeling very ill (Fever, Sore throat, cough, nausea, stuffy nose) and wanted to get tested for Covid. The wait was over 45 minutes, then once I finally got inside the room, my vitals were taken I was swabbed for covid (inaccurately, I may add). After being swabbed, I waited about 30-45 minutes for my results which the nurse stated was negative. I was provided with some papers, one of which had random prescriptions. When I asked about them, the nurse gave odd explanations as to why it would still work. I noticed that the vitals and my symptoms were also documented incorrectly as I had a fever that was over 100 degrees. When I mentioned my concerns, I was completely dismissed and disregarded. Once I got to the pharmacy, I realized that I was provided a completely different patient’s paperwork. THIS IS COMPLETELY UNACCEPTABLE and a major HIPPA violation. I went back to this urgent care to get things situated, and the staff gave me nasty attitudes and not one person cared or provided an apology for this negligence. The staff is irresponsible and I don’t recommend this place at all. I will also be suing.

name: Aline Roberts
text: This office is so professional and patient oriented. From the time you walk in, through the intake and seeing the physician, you are made to feel comfortable and welcomed. It's usually difficult to get through to my primary care physician's office, but I'm so fortunate to have this facility as a contingency. Excellent and quality care.

resp.text: Our teams strive to deliver an excellent experience, and are glad you found this to be the case during your visit. If you have further needs or questions, please reach out!

name: cynthia harrelson
text: INSURANCE FRAUD: we are covered by Cigna insurance company. American Family Care has a contract with them @ they do accept our insurance. Our insurance requires my husband @ I to have a yearly physical, no out of pocket cost. On August 2019 I had this same physical done at this facility @ no charge. Today July 22, 2020 they are demanding $50 per patient for a the same physical what a rip off. My insurance agent has stated that this is against their contract @ will be reported. If u find that u are having the same problem u can go 2 All South Urgent Care here in Dothan @ u wont have 2 come out of pocket. What a shame I've used AFC for years. But I'm  taking my health care needs to the above mentioned facility.

text: Came in for a simple sports physical for my daughter at 11:40. Everything progressed normally and they didn't seem busy with just two other parties in the waiting room. We were shown back and put in a room waiting for the doctor, two hours after we came in we were ready to give up when a nurse finally came in to apologize for the wait, I asked her how much longer it was going to be as we had been there for two hours already and were tired of waiting. She said she would find out and be back, but didn't come back. A little before 2pm we gave up and went to the front desk to get our money back and our physical form back. They did refund us and apologize for the wait but this should have been addressed long before a patient walks out.

I have not get any test and any symtoms and I explained I am just here to get the hydroxychloroquine for PREVENSION of COVID-19. However, this AFC does not prescribe hydroxychloroquine for any reason. Wasting time and NEVER VISIT.

I went in to AFC yesterday to see if they could see what was going on with my shoulder.  Only to be  told to take IBUPROFEN!! I informed him that I had been doing that. He then said that it could be bad on your stomach after telling me  to take IBUPROFEN  ! I was charged $175.00 just to be told to take IBU he did not offer to give me anything  non-narcotic or otherwise.
Please tell me why I was charged this just to be told to take IBU? Also I find it unprofessional  when his sister makes a comment on my Facebook  post in reference to my service at AFC.

text: Everyone was exceptional!!!!  Receptionist very friendly, and I didn't have to wait long. The medical assistant was so personable and made me feel at ease. When you don't feel good, it's nice to feel like you are not just a number. What is most impressive too is that I could hear the staff talking to each other with such genuine courtesy. No burned out employees there! It's evident that they love their jobs and calling!!!

name: Brian Smith
text:
TOTALLY DISAPPOINTED!
I went into American Family Care  on June 29th for a Covid19 test.  Got there early and was out by 8:45 am.  I was told it would take 3-5 days to get the results.  After 5 days I had received no results nor calls from them.  On the 8th day, July 6th, I called and got the "I guess they're backed up at the lab" story.  Then the girl told me "I'll give you the number to the lab and you can call them and find out what the problem is".   It would seem to me that's THEIR job not mine.  I finally got my results today July 9th at 5:15 pm. I was the one that called them! It was nine days after I'd taken the test.  The person there had the gall to tell me they tried to call me today.  I've had my phone with me all day and have no record of them calling on my recent calls log.  A simple phone call explaining the delay would have eased a lot of my stress.
Pretty bad...

He truly spent more time making fun of my last name (unclear why?) than he did examining me or asking me questions. Was in and out within probably a minute. And  prescribed antibiotics that were NOT indicated (I did not have any evidence of bacterial infection). The receptionist did say this was the first time that doctor was working there. Very unfortunate and probably one of the worst doctors I have ever seen, which is impressive.  If you plan to go here, cross your fingers Dr. Culver isn't working!

text: Don't waste your time at this joke of a clinic. I came in for a sinus infection and a cough. I waited to be seen for two hours. Once I got to the back they drew my blood for labs. The results came back and they sent me straight to the ER claiming that I needed a blood transfusion because of anemia. I've never been anemic in my entire life. However, I figured they knew more than I did so I went to hospital. After spending an entire night in the ER waiting room...the hospital said I was completely fine besides having the sinus infection and acute bronchitis. Let me rewind and say that the Nurse Practitioner that I seen at AFC didn't even treat my symptoms that I came in for, the ER doctor had to write me a prescription for antibiotics. I called the next day and spoke with the office manager and all they did was offer me a refund on my $20 copay. GO ANYWHERE ELSE BUT HERE!!!

name: Cindy Kelly
text: I was very pleased when I got home after my visit to see I had a copy of my vitals, prescription print out, and a detailed receipt for my records. Then today I got a call from my nurse checking on me to make sure I was doing better. I will definately make this my place of service in the future and highly recommend you to friends and family. Thank you for a speedy and thorough evaluation when I was there as well. You made me feel like was an important asset even though I didn't get there until 5:25. Made a big impression!

name: Ronald Grosser
text: I am very pleased with the care I received from the nurse practitioner and the staff. Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback! We're glad to hear we delivered such a great experience. If there's anything further we can do for you, we are happy to help!

name: Darja Byrne
text: This place is horrible!  We have had to wait over 3 hrs and still haven't seen the doctor. He's so busy I think with all of 7 patients when we arrived and the 7 includes the 2 of us!!! After 3 hrs we were brought back and had to wait an additional 1 hr. My grandson became faint for lack of food we didn't eat because we were told there was a 1 1/2 hr wait. When I asked if they had some orange juice, gatorade or crackers they said no. What doctor office doesn't have items in case patients sugar levels plummet because they have to wait for over 4 hours? Not the ones I have worked at!  So the Dr. ARRIVES and diagnosed him without any kind of strep or nasal test and puts him on steroids,  antibiotics and cough syrup.  And that took all of 5 min. Perhaps 10 since he was there when I arrived with the food. While we were in the room waiting the girls were having all kinds of fun laughing great customer service!  I'm going to send them an invoice after all our time is just as valuable as theirs.

resp.text: Hi there, I would like to get some more details about your experience with us. Our manager would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at (334) 677-6001. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Elizabeth Harris
text: Staff seemed to really care about their patients. Was not along wait at all.  I thought it was great they called me back the next day and wanted to know how I was feeling.  Was very willing to listen to my complaints that I was feeling about the other facility I had went too. Very caring.

resp.text: Hi Elizabeth, we are very happy to have provided you with such a positive experience! If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to reach out!

name: Karrie Sedor
text: Great place when in need

name: Tony Walker
text:
Anyone looking for quick and friendly place for medical i give AFC a 10.  I have been there several times.  Has always been a great experience.

Dr Lee Thomas and his staff are great.  Dr Thomas is great to visit with.

I hope you not have to go to Dr soon, but if you do; this is place to go

resp.text: Tony Walker, thank you so much for the positive review!

name: Liz Diggs
text: I always go to this walk in clinic when sick. I have sinus infections a couple of times a year. This time had an infected finger from a cut. Needed a tetanus  shot and antibiotics.   Always get in and out quickly and get excellent care. I recommend them all the time.

name: Deon C
text: Doctor sent lab work to LabCorp instead of Quest as we instructed. As a result our insurance denied our claim and we are responsible for the full amount and it would have been zero if the had done a good job. Thy have a contract with BC&BS and knew and agreed to their rules, but apparently they don't care.

resp.text: Deon C, we're disappointed to hear of the negative experience you had at our location. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will use your comments to refine our efforts to ensure this issue does not happen again.

name: Danny Thomas
text: Very punctual and professional care! If an emergency room and a doctors office had a love child, it would definitely be American Family Care! Big thanks to Dr. Thompson and the AFC staff!

resp.text: Hi Danny Thomas, thank you so much for your positive comments about American Family Care - Dothan! We are always more than happy to assist you if anything else comes up. Take care!

name: rebecca
text: Very friendly and prompt. Traveling from out of town and everyone was very helpful.

resp.text: We're glad to hear we delivered such a great experience. If there's anything further we can do for you, we are happy to help!

name: Jeanie Mann
text: I could not have been more pleased with American Family Care. I've tried other urgent care offices in Dothan and will only be going to American Family Care from now on. The front office staff was friendly, the staff who took my vitals was cheerful, even at work on a Saturday, the wait time was less than 5 minutes, and the doctor was very friendly and caring. The best part was before I could even make it home, I had a text from my pharmacy letting me know that my prescription was ready for pickup. To top it off, I received a call today from AFC to see how I was feeling. Great experience!

name: Onyx Cutts
text: The office was spotless and very modern looking. Excellent care, even when very close to closing time. My girlfriend had a UTI and was in great pain. We went to All South on 231 first, and they were very rude so we left. The care here was great, and everyone was extremely nice. We spoke to Erin when we were first called back. She was very accommodating. The nurse practitioner was was upbeat, understanding, and down to earth. The office even called her the next day (ON A SUNDAY) to check and see how she was doing. Highly recommended!

name: The Cooleys
text:
Since we lost our primary care physician a few years ago, we have used AFC for pretty much everything. The staff is friendly and the doctor(s) are helpful.

The wait can sometimes be a little long, but it is an urgent care facility so that should be expected.

We have and will continue to recommend AFC to others.

resp.text: Hi The Cooleys, thank you so much for your positive comments about American Family Care - Dothan!

name: Jessica Marienthal
text: Never been but called today. One of the only clinics open. The receptionist was rude when I asked if they took Medicaid. Why is it so hard to find a walk in clinic that takes Medicaid in Alabama????????

resp.text: Our manager would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at 334-677-6001. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: matthew quinn
text: Broken two bones in my foot and Heather was the best part!

name: Bryan Stewart
text: Dr. Thompson had a very Down to Earth manner that made me feel comfortable and relaxed.  Erin was very professional, and was glad to accommodate my special request of getting my wife to the examination room for me.  Overall it was a positive experience.

resp.text: Thank you very much for sharing these comments, Bryan Stewart. We always love to receive great feedback.

name: Bobby Bergeron
text: Very disappointed. Brought my child there on a Sat while her pediatrician offices was closed. She had a fever and a body rash. They literally said they didn't know what was wrong gave her an antibiotic and a steroid and sent us packing. No improvement of symptoms whatsoever. Brought her to the pediatrician office that Monday. She had full blown strep throat for at least five days that manifested into scarlet fever causing a rash according to her Dr. with the correct antibiotic her health improved rapidly. They were amazed the other Dr. couldn't diagnose it. I understand somethings are hard to catch, but a toddler with strep is not one of those things. I would think that's med school 101. They were either careless, incompetent, or lazy, take your pick. Don't flush your hard earned money down the drain here.

resp.text: Bobby Bergeron, we regret that you had a negative experience with us, but are glad you brought this to our attention. Our manager would really like to help turn your experience around. If you would be willing to give us another chance, please contact our manager at (334) 677-6001 to discuss what we can do to help.

name: Eleanor Ashie
text: I was seen by Abby, CRNP who was very professional with good bedside manners. To me that's excellent service! Thanks to all the AFC staff for taking good care of me. God bless you all!!

resp.text: Eleanor, we're so glad that we were able to go above and beyond your expectations! Our team strives to deliver an excellent experience, and are glad you found this to be the case during your visit. If you have further needs or questions, please reach out!

name: Paige Lincoln
text: Dr. T us so kind, professional,  and caring. He never rushes in and out the door. He listens and cares for the correct treatment for his patients . I drive further just to see him because he's so caring and thorough.

resp.text: Hi Paige, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at American Family Care - Dothan. We're happy we could meet your expectations! If you have any further questions, please give us a call. We're always happy to help!

name: Jo Ann Sutton
text: I have used AFC many times and have always found personnel to be professional and very helpful.

resp.text: We are always more than happy to assist you if anything else comes up. Take care!

name: Robert Forehand
text: Very satisfied! A bit of a wait but Dr was through. Very pleased!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review! If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: Shonda Newsome
text: Dr.Travis Thompson is a wonderful Dr and he's the only one i see there. He genuinely concerned about your health and will pull all stops until you are better. I have only four stars because the receptionist(s) need better customers service

name: Chad White
text: Whenever a kidney stone drops then you want to trust that the Google reviews and hours are accurate especially when trying to avoid a ridiculous e.r. co-pay.  For this place....they are not.....the physician not only was not there at 5:30 p.m. but they also close at 6 p.m. now instead of the 8 p.m. listed.  Please update your hours and rather or not a physician is there as perscribing aspirin for a kidney stone is worthless.

resp.text: Chad White, it's upsetting to hear that you did not receive the top-notch service we strive to provide. Please contact us at (334) 677-6001 so we can work with you to make this right.

name: Chas Cambo
text:
Thanks for the prompt courteous service.   Even though many people preceded me the wait was not long at all.  Today I'm all fixed up & feel great 👍🏻

Thank you AFC

resp.text: Chas, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to the team here at American Family Care - Dothan! We are always more than happy to assist you if anything else comes up. Take care!

name: Joann Bradley
text: Jessica and Miranda were both so genuinely sweet. I overheard four patients asking if Dr. Thompson was in,  and after seeing him I realized why. He was friendly, personable, and asked all the right questions on how I was feeling. I was in and out within an hour. I was going on a week feeling miserable,  but was able to get a steroid shot and medication sent to my pharmacy. This staff has changed my perception on urgent cares. Thank you so much.

resp.text: Joann, we're so glad that we were able to go above and beyond your expectations! If you're ever in need of more help, please let us know!

name: Megan Collins
text: Phenomenal staff from the time I walked in until the time I left. Lacie, aj Welch and Dr. Thompson were great and I was in and out in less than 45 minutes. Already feeling better in less than 24 hours. Thank you for a great experience.

name: serena Robinson
text: My provider was awesome.. very impressed that they followed up the following day.. I feel great now

resp.text: Serena, we are so happy to read such a great review about American Family Care - Dothan! Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you; we are more than happy to help!

name: Marie “Ellie” Hatcher
text: Surprisingly fast for a walk in! Everyone there was great!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback! We hope you have a great day!

name: Tasha Burgess
text: I really love American Family Care. The nurse and doctor were friendly and fantastic!! I especially like the printout they give you at the end which gives you all the details about your visit. I truly appreciate the quality of care they provide.

resp.text: Tasha, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to the team here at American Family Care - Dothan! We are always more than happy to assist you if anything else comes up. Take care!

name: Phyllis Jackson
text: AFC is the best Urgent Care office in the Dothan area. Wait time is wonderful ...The only place me and my family will go to from now on..... Dr Thompson is the Best!

resp.text: Phyllis, thank you so much for the positive review! Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything additional we can do for you.

name: Carmeshia Walker
text: I have to say I was extremely pleased with my care today. I've been in so much pain for months, but Dr. Thompson assured me that he would help me. The atmosphere was pleasant and they are very kind-hearted. I will most definitely recommend this practice.

resp.text: Hi Carmeshia, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at American Family Care - Dothan. We're happy we could meet your expectations! Thank you again for letting our team know how we did! We look forward to helping again in the future. Take care!

name: Helen Buckhaulter
text: The staff and the Dr. were very caring. I didn't have to wait a long time. I will definitely go there again.

resp.text: Helen Buckhaulter, thank you so much for the positive review!

name: Penny Drage
